metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20176 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Pure-FTPd 1.0.49, a stack exhaustion issue was discovered in the listdirfunction in ls.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20176` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

pure-ftpd - 1.0.49-2
pure-ftpd-common - 1.0.49-2
pure-ftpd-ldap - 1.0.49-2
pure-ftpd-mysql - 1.0.49-2
pure-ftpd-postgresql - 1.0.49-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: pure-ftpd package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.49-2').
